(
    TransactionID INTEGER

    Time          TEXT,
    CustomerID    INTEGER,

    Amount        INTEGER,
    Price         REAL
);

content.text:
The database schema contains no information about point-of-sale terminal devices or their models. The claim references "Verifone Vx520 devices," which is a specific POS terminal hardware model. None of the tables have columns for terminal type, terminal model, or device information.

While I can verify CZK transactions on the morning of 2012-08-26 (using `customers.Currency`, `transactions_1k.Date`, and `transactions_1k.Time`), there is no way to verify what type of POS terminal was used — that concept is entirely outside the database schema.
